ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync List Item resource to update.

ListSid.description: The SID of the Sync List with the Sync List Item resource to update. Can be the Sync List resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.

Index.description: The index of the Sync List Item resource to update.

If-Match.description: If provided, applies this mutation if (and only if) the “revision” field of this [map item] matches the provided value. This matches the semantics of (and is implemented with) the HTTP [If-Match header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/If-Match).

CollectionTtl.description: How long, [in seconds](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/limits#sync-payload-limits), before the List Item's parent Sync List expires (time-to-live) and is deleted. This parameter can only be used when the List Item's `data` or `ttl` is updated in the same request.

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the List Item stores. Can be up to 16 KiB in length.

ItemTtl.description: How long, [in seconds](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/limits#sync-payload-limits), before the List Item expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.

Ttl.description: An alias for `item_ttl`. If both parameters are provided, this value is ignored.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the List Item resource.

**created_by**: The identity of the List Item's creator. If the item is created from the client SDK, the value matches the Access Token's `identity` field. If the item was created from the REST API, the value is `system`.
**data**: An arbitrary, schema-less object that the List Item stores. Can be up to 16 KiB in length.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

**date_expires**: The date and time in GMT when the List Item expires and will be deleted, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format. If the List Item does not expire, this value is `null`. The List Item resource might not be deleted immediately after it expires.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**index**: The automatically generated index of the List Item. The `index` values of the List Items in a Sync List can have gaps in their sequence.
**list_sid**: The SID of the Sync List that contains the List Item.
**revision**: The current revision of the item, represented as a string.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) the resource is associated with.
**url**: The absolute URL of the List Item resource.
